TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 添付プロパティの使用範囲を報告する .NET Framework 属性の基底クラスを提供します。

span.span: Provides a base class for .NET Framework attributes that report the use scope of attached properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks この [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] (および派生クラス) の説明で使用されているように `browsable` 用語の意味は に関する説明に似ていますが、添付プロパティの参照可能な状態は、主に [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] の概念であるため、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]のプロパティ情報に特に関連します。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] (and derived classes) is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: クラスの新しいインスタンスを初期化します。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
